results.name: Waifu App: 90 Days to Escape a Lonely Fate

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260x or equivalent (DirectX 11 compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio (commonly found on most PCs) or DirectX compatible soundcard with latest drivers
  • VR Support: N/A
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600 or better (Quad core processors are ideal for most Unity games)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster X or ASUS Xonar SE
  • VR Support: N/A
